title: On the Inside, Bitch
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

+ On the Inside, Bitch

[[/=]]

[[=image https://imgur.com/Smd07jg.jpg]]

[[=]]
++++++ //"On the Inside, Bitch", mixed media collage and marker, like June 2020 or some shit//
[[/=]]


This is also a self-portrait because I've not always been a [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:gerbilgoddess Gerbil Goddess] and I've not always actually had longerishkinda hair and I do actually have a face when it occurs to me to do so. 

A person can get awful sick and lose their face, floating around alone for along enough. One day, I'll write a Tale about that. 

Anyway, come [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reform-the-universe reform the universe] with me, where you can find my main-man [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kit-s-home-hub-of-happening Kit] and a mishmash of other horrors, comforts and devastations.

------

[[=]]

+++++ Do you want to meet [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:kitsuckingtoohardonthatlollipop Kit?]

[[/=]]
author: Zara Calico
